content: I think a filter like the one in the attached picture will work. Whitelist is an address book that has the whitelisted contacts. Contacts can be copied between address books by drag and drop, while holding Ctrl. Contacts can be added to Personal Address Book from messages by clicking the icon beside the sender in the message header, and can be added to other address books by clicking the icon twice.
creator: sfhowes

content:
On your new system, find the profile with "default-release" in the name.

Copy the CONTENTS of the backup directory with "default-release" in the name, into the new system's "default-release" directory.
creator: wsmwk
